    #include<string.h>
    #include<stdio.h>
    #define MAX 1000012
    char str[MAX],ans[MAX];
    int main()
    {
    int a,p,i,j;
    scanf("%d%d",&a,&p);
    scanf("%s",str);
    int l;
    l=a-1;
    int uj=0;
    for(i=0;i<p;i++)
    {
    int counta=0,countb=0,countc=0;
    for(j=0;j<a/p;j++)
    {
    //p//rintf("1");
    if(str[i+j*p]=='a')
    counta++;
    if(str[i+j*p]=='b')
    countb++;
    if(str[i+j*p]=='c')
    countc++;
    }
    //int max;
    //max=(counta>countb?counta:countb)>countc?(counta>countb?counta:countb):countc;
    if(counta>=countb&&counta>=countc)
    ans[uj++]='a';
    else if(countb>counta&&countb>=countc)
    ans[uj++]='b';
    else if(countc>countb&&countc>countb)
    ans[uj++]='c';
    }
    ans[uj++]='\0';
    printf("%s",ans);
    return 0;
    }
